scripts.create-dirs: mkdir -p dist/popup dist/content dist/background dist/styles dist/assets/icons
scripts.bundle:all: npm run bundle:content && npm run bundle:background && npm run bundle:popup && npm run bundle:inject
scripts.build: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chromium
scripts.build:firefox: npm run check:types && npm run clean && npm run create-dirs && npm run pre:web-ext:firefox && npm run build:common && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:chromium: npm run check:types && npm run clean && npm run create-dirs && npm run pre:web-ext:chromium && npm run build:common && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:edge: npm run check:types && npm run clean && npm run create-dirs && npm run pre:web-ext:edge && npm run build:common && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:common: npm run build:polyfill && npm run bundle:all && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run post:build
scripts.build:html: cp src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && cp src/popup/settings.html dist/popup/
scripts.pre:web-ext:firefox: cp manifests/manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && npm run sync-package-fields-to-manifest
scripts.pre:web-ext:chromium: cp manifests/manifest.chromium.json manifest.json && npm run sync-package-fields-to-manifest
scripts.pre:web-ext:edge: cp manifests/manifest.edge.json manifest.json && npm run sync-package-fields-to-manifest
scripts.package: npm run package:firefox && npm run package:chromium
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && rm -rf build-tmp && mkdir build-tmp && cp -r dist build-tmp/ && cp LICENSE build-tmp/ && cp CHANGELOG.md build-tmp/ && cp manifest.json build-tmp/ && rm -f build-tmp/dist/assets/icons/icon_edge.png && (cd build-tmp && web-ext build --overwrite-dest -a ../web-ext-artifacts/firefox --filename=firefox-hym-${npm_package_version}.zip) && rm -rf build-tmp && npm run clean
scripts.package:chromium: npm run build:chromium && rm -rf build-tmp && mkdir build-tmp && cp -r dist build-tmp/ && cp LICENSE build-tmp/ && cp CHANGELOG.md build-tmp/ && cp manifest.json build-tmp/ && rm -f build-tmp/dist/assets/icons/icon_edge.png && (cd build-tmp && web-ext build --overwrite-dest -a ../web-ext-artifacts/chromium --filename=chromium-hym-${npm_package_version}.zip) && rm -rf build-tmp && npm run clean
scripts.package:edge: npm run build:edge && rm -rf build-tmp && mkdir build-tmp && cp -r dist build-tmp/ && cp LICENSE build-tmp/ && cp CHANGELOG.md build-tmp/ && cp manifest.json build-tmp/ && rm -f build-tmp/dist/assets/icons/icon.png build-tmp/dist/assets/icons/icon_48.png build-tmp/dist/assets/icons/icon_96.png && mv build-tmp/dist/assets/icons/icon_edge.png build-tmp/dist/assets/icons/icon.png && (cd build-tmp && web-ext build --overwrite-dest -a ../web-ext-artifacts/edge --filename=edge-hym-${npm_package_version}.zip) && rm -rf build-tmp && npm run clean
